pr_title: RDM-9954 Remove defaultValue from the API

timeline.bodyText: Changed to JsonIgnore instead of removing, because it is defined in the definition-store and comes from there.
timeline.author: rafalkalita

timeline.bodyText: CaseFieldDefiniton is going to created from Definition store, may be we need this defaultValue method?
timeline.author: kiran-yenigala-hmcts

replies.bodyText: As per conversation this is not coming from the definition store and it is not used.
replies.author: rafalkalita

timeline.bodyText: CaseEventFieldDefiniton is going to created from Definition store, may be we need this defaultValue method?

replies.bodyText: Same as above. As per conversation this is not coming from the definition store and it is not used.
